{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.7K in 2021-2022** on contracts with MISHKUMI TECHNOLOGIES.

Across 207 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 15 have at least one amendment (7%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 17% and the average number of amendments was 1.07. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$-2.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.38 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$118.1K. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.2M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
